verses.verse: Then <WG1899> After <WG1223> Fourteen <WG1180> Years <WG2094> Again <WG3825> I Went Up <WG305> To <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414> With <WG3326> Barnabas, <WG921> Taking With <WG4838> Me Also <WG2532> Titus; <WG5103>

' But <WG235> Not Even <WG3761> Titus <WG5103> Who Was <WG3588> With <WG4862> Me, <WG1698> A Greek <WG1672> Being, <WG5607> Was Compelled <WG315> To Be Circumcised; <WG4059>

<WG1223> And This On Account Of <WG1161> The <WG3588> Brought In Stealthily <WG3920> False Brethren, <WG5569> Who <WG3748> Came In By Stealth <WG3922> To Spy Out <WG2684> <WG3588> Freedom <WG1657> Our <WG2257> Which <WG3739> We Have <WG2192> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> That <WG2443> Us <WG2248> They Might Bring Into Bondage; <WG2615>

To Whom <WG3739> Not Even <WG3761> For <WG4314> An Hour <WG5610> Did We Yield <WG1502> <WG3588> In Subjection, <WG5292> That <WG2443> The <WG3588> Truth <WG225> Of The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> Might Continue <WG1265> With <WG4314> You. <WG5209>

From <WG575> But <WG1161> Those <WG3588> Reputed <WG1380> To Be <WG1511> Something, <WG5100> <WG3697> Whatsoever <WG4218> They Were <WG2258> No <WG3762> To Me <WG3427> Makes Difference : The <WG1308> Person <WG4383> God <WG2316> Of Man <WG444> Not <WG3756> Does Accept; <WG2983> <WG1698> For To Me <WG1063> Those <WG3588> Of Repute <WG1380> Nothing <WG3762> Conferred; <WG4323>

But <WG235> On The Contrary, <WG5121> Having Seen <WG1492> That <WG3754> I Have Been Entrusted With <WG4100> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> Of The <WG3588> Uncircumcision, <WG203> According As <WG2531> Peter That <WG4074> Of The <WG3588> Circumcision, <WG4061>

And <WG2532> Having Known <WG1097> The <WG3588> Grace <WG5485> Which <WG3588> Was Given <WG1325> To Me, <WG3427> James <WG2385> And <WG2532> Cephas <WG2786> And <WG2532> John, <WG2491> Those <WG3588> Reputed <WG1380> Pillars <WG4769> To Be, The <WG1511> Right Hands <WG1188> They Gave <WG1325> To Me <WG1698> And <WG2532> Barnabas <WG921> Of Fellowship, <WG2842> That <WG2443> We Should Go <WG2249> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Nations, <WG1484> <WG846> And They <WG1161> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Circumcision : <WG4061>
Only <WG3440> The <WG3588> Poor <WG4434> That <WG2443> We Should Remember, <WG3421> Which <WG3739> Also <WG2532> I Was Diligent <WG4704> <WG846> Very Thing <WG5124> To Do. <WG4160>

<WG3753> But When <WG1161> Came <WG2064> Peter <WG4074> To <WG1519> Antioch, <WG490> <WG2596> To The Face <WG4383> Him <WG846> I Withstood, <WG436> Because <WG3754> To Be Condemned <WG2607> He Was : <WG2258>

<WG4253> <WG3588> For Before That <WG1063> Came <WG2064> Some <WG5100> From <WG575> James, <WG2385> With <WG3326> The <WG3588> Nations <WG1484> He Was Eating; <WG4906> <WG3753> But When <WG1161> They Came, <WG2064> He Was Drawing Back <WG5288> And <WG2532> Was Separating <WG873> Himself, <WG1438> Being Afraid Of <WG5399> Those <WG3588> Of The <WG1537> Circumcision; <WG4061>

And <WG2532> Conjointly Dissembled <WG4942> With Him <WG846> Also <WG2532> The <WG3588> Rest <WG3062> Of The Jews, <WG2453> So That <WG5620> Even <WG2532> Barnabas <WG921> Was Carried Away <WG4879> Their <WG846> <WG3588> By Dissimulation. <WG5272>

' But <WG235> When <WG3753> I Saw <WG1492> That <WG3754> <WG3756> They Walk Not Uprightly <WG3716> According To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Truth <WG225> Of The <WG3588> Glad Tidings, <WG2098> I Said <WG2036> <WG3588> To Peter <WG4074> Before <WG1715> All, <WG3956> If <WG1487> Thou, <WG4771> A Jew <WG2453> Being, <WG5225> Nation Like <WG1483> Livest <WG2198> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> Jewishly, <WG2452> Why <WG5101> The <WG3588> Nations <WG1484> Dost Thou Compel <WG315> To Judaize? <WG2450>
We, <WG2249> By Nature <WG5449> Jews, <WG2453> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> Of The <WG1537> Nations <WG1484> Sinners, <WG268>

Knowing <WG1492> That <WG3754> <WG3756> Is Not Justified <WG1344> A Man <WG444> By <WG1537> Works <WG2041> Of Law, <WG3551> <WG1437> But <WG3361> Through <WG1223> Faith <WG4102> Of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> Also <WG2532> We <WG2249> On <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> Believed, <WG4100> That <WG2443> We Might Be Justified <WG1344> By <WG1537> Faith <WG4102> Of Christ, <WG5547> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> By <WG1537> Works <WG2041> Of Law; <WG3551> Because <WG1360> <WG3756> Shall Be Justified <WG1344> By <WG1537> Works <WG2041> Of Law <WG3551> Any <WG3956> Flesh. <WG4561>

<WG1487> Now If <WG1161> Seeking <WG2212> To Be Justified <WG1344> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> We Were Found <WG2147> Also <WG2532> Ourselves <WG846> Sinners, <WG268> Is Then <WG687> Christ <WG5547> Of Sin <WG266> Minister? <WG1249> <WG3361> May It Not Be! <WG1096>
<WG1487> For If <WG1063> What <WG3739> I Threw Down <WG2647> These Things <WG5023> Again <WG3825> I Build, <WG3618> A Transgressor <WG3848> Myself <WG1683> I Constitute. <WG4921>
<WG1473> For I 1063 CONJ Through 1223 PREP Law 3551 N-GSM To Law 3551 N-DSM Died, 599 V-2AAI-1S That 2443 CONJ To God 2316 N-DSM I May Live. 2198 V-AAS-1S

Christ <WG5547> I Have Been Crucified With, <WG4957> <WG2198> Yet I Live, <WG1161> No Longer <WG3765> I, <WG1473> <WG2198> But Lives <WG1161> In <WG1722> Me <WG1698> Christ; <WG5547> <WG3739> But That Which <WG1161> Now <WG3568> I Live <WG2198> In <WG1722> Flesh, <WG4561> In <WG1722> Faith <WG4102> I Live, <WG2198> That <WG3588> Of The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> Who <WG3588> Loved <WG25> Me <WG3165> And <WG2532> Gave Up <WG3860> Himself <WG1438> For <WG5228> Me. <WG1700>
